from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='pop-alarm-table-cell pop-alarm-table-action']/span/a[text()='创建工单']")

[文档]class AlarmInnerCricle(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='pop-alarm-background']/div[@class='pop-alarm-center']/div[@class='flex-center']")



[文档]class Wait():
    @classmethod

[文档]    def WaitForAlarmListDisplay(cls):
        AlarmInnerCricle.WaitForAppearing(10)
        AlarmInnerCricle.WaitForDisappearing()



[文档]class FilterButton(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='pop-alarm-settingCondition']//span[text()='筛选']")
